content.rendered:
THe wedding of

Monic & Luthfi

Invite you to share in their joy as they exchange marriage vows

20 NOVEMBER 2023

Our Love Story

Luthfi Ibnu Raid, A.Md

1st son from 2
Mr. H. Ramelan, A.Md
Mrs. Hj. Ida Ery Kurniawati, S.Pd

Instagram
&

Monica Rosaline, A.Md

2nd daughter from 3
Mr. Dedi Rohendi, A.Md
Mrs. Rusyati, A.Md

Instagram

Acara

Akad Nikah

20 November 2023 | 09.00 - 10.00 WIB

Address

Gedung Denzibang Cirebon,
Sunyaragi, Kec. Kesambi, Kota Cirebon

Petunjuk Arah

Reception

20 November 2023 | 11.00 - 14.00 WIB

Address

Gedung Denzibang Cirebon,
Sunyaragi, Kec. Kesambi, Kota Cirebon

Petunjuk Arah

Protokol Kesehatan

Tamu masuk lokasi acara secara bergiliran

Tamu undangan wajib menggunakan masker

Tidak bersalaman (Na Maste)

Suhu tubuh normal
(dibawah 37,5°C)

Jaga jarak antar orang sekitar minimal sekitar 1 meter

Cuci tangan menggunakan air dan sabun atau menggunakan hand sanitizer

Bagi para tamu undangan diharapkan mengikuti protokol pencegahan COVID-19.

We Are Getting Married

Days
Hours
Minutes
Seconds
Ingatkan via Google Calendar

Please confirm your attendance by clicking this button.

ATTEND

Our Moments

“And of His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquillity in them; and He placed between you affection and mercy. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.”

( QS. Ar- Rum 21 )

SEND US GIFTS

We really appreciate for your time to come. If you can't come due the pandemic concern, you can still send us gifts.

Luthfi Ibnu Raid
Salam RT02 RW03, Merdikorejo
Tempel, Sleman, Yogyakarta 55552

Monica Rosaline
Jln. Kinurakim Karang Jalak No.55B Rt/Rw 02/06, Sunyaragi
Kesambi, Cirebon 45132

LUTHFI IBNU RAID
Bank Mandiri
1370011285463
Copy No. Rekening
MONICA ROSALINE
Bank Mandiri
1340026381573
Copy No. Rekening

Location

You Are Invited

We can’t wait to celebrate our special day with you.
4 Ucapan

*Mohon maaf! Khusus untuk tamu undangan

*Minimal 2 karakter.
*Silahkan pilih konfirmasi kehadiran

Do not change these fields following

    Made with by

    Monic & Luthfi
    Kpd Bpk/Ibu/Saudara/i
    Tanpa Mengurangi Rasa Hormat, Kami Mengundang Anda Untuk Berhadir Di Acara Pernikahan Kami.
